content: <collection xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim"> <record>   <controlfield tag="001">10006</controlfield>   <controlfield tag="005">20141027191638.0</controlfield>   <datafield tag="024" ind1="7" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="2">DOI</subfield>     <subfield code="a">10.5281/zenodo.10006</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a"><p>Spreadsheet of data sourced on South African sources, resources and providers of higher education open data. Composed through desk review as principle component of the situational analysis conducted for the &#39;Use of open data in the governance of South African higher education&#39; research project, in the IDRC/WWWF &#39;Exploring Emerging Impacts of Open Data in the South&#39; initiative.</p></subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="540" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="u">http://www.opendefinition.org/licenses/cc-by-sa</subfield>     <subfield code="a">Creative Commons Attribution Share-Alike</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="650" ind1="1" ind2="7">     <subfield code="a">cc-by-sa</subfield>     <subfield code="2">opendefinition.org</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="245" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">South African Open Data in Higher Education: Sources, resources and providers</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="500" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">GIS coordinates included for visualisation purposes.</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="542" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="l">open</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="856" ind1="4" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="u">http://zenodo.org/record/10006/files/SouthAfricanOpenDataHigherEd_sources_resources_providers.xlsx</subfield>     <subfield code="z">0</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="909" ind1="C" ind2="O">     <subfield code="o">oai:zenodo.org:10006</subfield>     <subfield code="p">user-odsahe</subfield>     <subfield code="p">user-zenodo</subfield>     <subfield code="p">openaire_data</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">user-odsahe</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">user-zenodo</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">dataset</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">open data;
